# Empirical Results

A summary of the experimental results is provided in Table \@ref(tab:data-summary) in the Appendix, along with the statistical fitting of the data to different growth models. 

Describe the results, in particular Figure \@ref(fig:time).


```{r load-data}
read_matrixmult_stats <- function  (filename) {
  
  rawdata = read.table(filename)
  
  dataframe <- data.frame(
    "size" = rawdata[,1],
    "time" = apply(t(rawdata)[-1,], 2, mean),
    "se"  = apply(t(rawdata)[-1,], 2, sd) / sqrt(dim(rawdata)[2]-1)
  ) 
  
  n <- dim(rawdata)[1];
  b0 <- log(dataframe$time[n]/dataframe$time[n-1])/log(dataframe$size[n]/dataframe$size[n-1])
  a0 <- dataframe$time[n]/(dataframe$size[n]^b0)
  datafit <- nls(time ~ a * size^b, data=dataframe, start = list(a = a0, b = b0))
  fitfun <- function(x) predict(datafit, newdata=data.frame(size=x))
  xx <- seq(min(dataframe$size), max(dataframe$size))
  data_projection <- data.frame(
      "size" = xx,
      "time" = fitfun(xx)
    )
  datalist <-list(data = dataframe, fit = datafit, f = fitfun, dataproj = data_projection)

}  

brute <- read_matrixmult_stats(paste(params$algorithm, ".txt", sep=""))

```


```{r time, fig.cap="Time required for multiplying matrices of increasing size", fig.align = "center"}
# Graphical representation

library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
col = c("data" = "blue", "fit" = "red")
figure <- ggplot(data=brute$data, aes(x=size, y=time)) + 
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=time-se, ymax=time+se, color="data"), width=.2) +
  geom_point(shape=21, size=3, aes(colour="data"), fill="white") +
  geom_line(data=brute$dataproj, aes(colour = "fit")) + 
  scale_colour_manual(name = "", values = col, 
                        labels = c("data", 
                                   bquote(                                     .(format(summary(brute$fit)$coefficients[1], scientific=TRUE, digits = 3)) ~ "Â·" ~ .(format(summary(brute$fit)$coefficients[2], scientific=FALSE, digits = 3))^n
                                     )
                                  )
    ) + 
  guides(color = guide_legend(override.aes = list(shape = c(1, NA), 
                                                    linetype = c("blank",
                                                                 "solid"),
                                                    colour = c("blue", "red")
    ) 
    )
    ) +
    theme_bw() + 
    theme(aspect.ratio=1) + 
    theme(legend.justification = c(0, 1), 
          legend.position = c(0.05, 1.05), 
          legend.box.margin=margin(c(5,5,5,5)),
          legend.background = element_rect(fill='transparent')) + 
  ylab("time (s)") 

  show(figure)

```

library(knitr)

alg <- params$algorithm

table_dataframe <- data.frame(
    "size" = dataframe$size,
    "mean" = format(dataframe$time, scientific=TRUE, digits = 3),
    "se" = format(dataframe$se, scientific=TRUE, digits = 3)
  )
cat(kable(table_dataframe, format = "latex",
      col.names = c("size", "time (mean)", "time (se)"), 
      caption = paste(sprintf("\\label{tab:%s} ", alg), 
                      "Summary of the experimental results for ", alg, ".",

  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "HOLD_position")) %>%

  )
